title: 4.3 Master Challenge 1
question:
Test your chatbot with different inputs as given below and fill the table based on the output.

Do you think this chatbot is intelligent? Explain.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
